intro: Persoonia linearis, commonly known as the narrow-leaf geebung, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the Proteaceae family and is characterized by its slender, linear leaves and showy, pinkish-white flowers. The plant typically grows in heathlands and coastal areas, preferring well-drained soils. It produces small, woody fruits that contain seeds dispersed by animals. Persoonia linearis is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its unique foliage and delicate blooms.
